body:
Makes binutils 75% smaller. Before:

```
543M    /home/harmen/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2/gcc-9.3.0/binutils-2.34-s5r3knl7xrfiklphlgqobkwn242lytin
```
after:
```
142M    /home/harmen/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2/gcc-9.3.0/binutils-2.34-t67x54dbrf7yk5t3qaqjifycex3zeiwx
```

Edit: strategy has changed from adding a patch, to setting default optimization flags in `package.py` and making them overridable through `cflags=...`

Closes #18120
title: Remove -g flag by default in binutils
